titleStmt.title: The copy of a barbarous and bloody declaration by the Irish rebels, against the Supreame Councell of Ireland. And the votes of the Popish Assembly at Waterford against peace. And a proclamation excommunicating the clergie of Kilkennie, from saying maskes, or executing any other church-offices. September. the 28. This declaration and proclamation is examined, printed and published according to order.

The copy of a barbarous and bloody declaration by the Irish rebels, against the Supreame Councell of Ireland. And the votes of the Popish Assembly at Waterford against peace. And a proclamation excommunicating the clergie of Kilkennie, from saying maskes, or executing any other church-offices. September. the 28. This declaration and proclamation is examined, printed and published according to order.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
